contextId.occurrenceNote: Here "face in the flesh" represents the person as a whole. Alternate translation: "all those who have never seen me personally" or "all those whom I have never met face to face" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-synecdoche]])
contextId.quote: ὅσοι οὐχ ἑόρακαν τὸ πρόσωπόν μου ἐν σαρκί
contextId.glQuote: as many as have not seen my face in the flesh
